newsitem.title: UK: Telkom at $34.5 in London at 0931 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Telkom at $34.5 in London at 0931 GMT.

text.p: PT Telkom traded at $34.5 and London at 0931 GMT on Wednesday. It recorded the day's low of $33.4 and the day's high of $34.5.
Its previous close on Tuesday $33.375. One ADS represents 20 ordinary shares -- Jakarta newsroom (Tel: 6221-3846364).
